page.title: 11Clubs
page.content: Most clubs in this area are usually held in the Community Centre. For the children there are Guides, Brownies, Scouts, Cubs; there are Welsh and English playgroups, Mother and Toddler group, a Playgroup Club and the Senior Citizens hold their meetings on Wednesday afternoons. The Church has a Mother's Union, a Men's and Young Wives group and an Altar Guild. These groups meet every week in the Church Hall. They usually work for charity and the Church. The Chapel has Merched Y Wawr (Welsh W.I.), Young People's Guild, Youth Club, Chwaeroliaeth (sisterhood - cultural and social club) Cwmni'r Merched (Young Wives), Dosbarth Beiblaidd (studying Bible and literature).There are 2 rugby clubs, a British Legion and the Jubilee Club. Most locals belong to 1 or more clubs.
